languages.text: "Неблагодарная чернь подняла мятеж против законного губернатора планеты и его милости Каллигоса Винтерскейла, волею Императора — нашего владыки! Все они есть еретики, достойные худшей казни. Порядок будет восстановлен, виновные — наказаны!"

"The ungrateful rabble rose in rebellion against the planet's lawful governor and His Lordship Calligos Winterscale, our ruler by the will of the Emperor! They are all heretics deserving of a most terrible death. Order will be restored. The guilty will be punished!"
languages.original_text: "Неблагодарная чернь подняла мятеж против законного губернатора планеты и его милости Каллигоса Винтерскейла, волею Императора — нашего владыки! Все они есть еретики, достойные худшей казни. Порядок будет восстановлен, виновные — наказаны!"

"The ungrateful rabble rose in rebellion against the planet's lawful governor and His Lordship Calligos Winterscale, our ruler by the will of the Emperor! They are all heretics deserving of a most terrible death. Order will be restored. The guilty will be punished!"

languages.text: "Erst hat der undankbare Pöbel gegen den rechtmäßigen Gouverneur des Planeten rebelliert — und gegen seine Lordschaft Calligos Winterzunder, unseren Herrscher durch des Imperators Gnaden! Diese Ketzer haben alle einen grauenhaften Tod verdient. Wir werden die Ordnung wiederherstellen. Wir werden die Schuldigen bestrafen!"
languages.original_text: "The ungrateful rabble rose in rebellion against the planet's lawful governor and His Lordship Calligos Winterscale, our ruler by the will of the Emperor! They are all heretics deserving of a most terrible death. Order will be restored. The guilty will be punished!"

traits.locale_text: "Erst hat der undankbare Pöbel gegen den rechtmäßigen Gouverneur des Planeten rebelliert — und gegen seine Lordschaft Calligos Winterzunder, unseren Herrscher durch des Imperators Gnaden! Diese Ketzer haben alle einen grauenhaften Tod verdient. Wir werden die Ordnung wiederherstellen. Wir werden die Schuldigen bestrafen!"

languages.text: « La populace ingrate s'est révoltée contre le gouverneur légitime de la planète et Sa Seigneurie Calligos Winterscale, notre souverain par la volonté de l'Empereur ! Ce ne sont que des hérétiques méritant la pire des morts. L'ordre va être rétabli. Les coupables seront punis ! »
languages.original_text: "The ungrateful rabble rose in rebellion against the planet's lawful governor and His Lordship Calligos Winterscale, our ruler by the will of the Emperor! They are all heretics deserving of a most terrible death. Order will be restored. The guilty will be punished!"

traits.locale_text: « La populace ingrate s'est révoltée contre le gouverneur légitime de la planète et Sa Seigneurie Calligos Winterscale, notre souverain par la volonté de l'Empereur ! Ce ne sont que des hérétiques méritant la pire des morts. L'ordre va être rétabli. Les coupables seront punis ! »

languages.text: “这些忘恩负义的暴民聚集起来，打算反抗这颗行星的合法统治者与卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔大人，他可是帝皇指定的统治者！那些叛军都是该死的异端分子。秩序迟早会恢复，有罪者必将受到惩罚！”
languages.original_text: "The ungrateful rabble rose in rebellion against the planet's lawful governor and His Lordship Calligos Winterscale, our ruler by the will of the Emperor! They are all heretics deserving of a most terrible death. Order will be restored. The guilty will be punished!"

traits.locale_text: “这些忘恩负义的暴民聚集起来，打算反抗这颗行星的合法统治者与卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔大人，他可是帝皇指定的统治者！那些叛军都是该死的异端分子。秩序迟早会恢复，有罪者必将受到惩罚！”

languages.text: 「恩知らずの暴徒どもは、この惑星の総督と、皇帝の意志により定められた我らの統治者であるカリゴス・ウィンタースケール卿に対して反乱を起こした！彼らは皆、異端者であり皇帝によって恐ろしい死を与えられるだろう。秩序は回復される。罪人は罰せられるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "The ungrateful rabble rose in rebellion against the planet's lawful governor and His Lordship Calligos Winterscale, our ruler by the will of the Emperor! They are all heretics deserving of a most terrible death. Order will be restored. The guilty will be punished!"

traits.locale_text: 「恩知らずの暴徒どもは、この惑星の総督と、皇帝の意志により定められた我らの統治者であるカリゴス・ウィンタースケール卿に対して反乱を起こした！彼らは皆、異端者であり皇帝によって恐ろしい死を与えられるだろう。秩序は回復される。罪人は罰せられるのだ！」

languages.text: «¡La chusma desagradecida se rebeló contra el legítimo gobernador del planeta y milord Calligos Winterscale, nuestro gobernante por voluntad del Emperador! Son todos unos herejes y merecen la muerte más atroz. El orden será restaurado. Los culpables serán castigados».
languages.original_text: "The ungrateful rabble rose in rebellion against the planet's lawful governor and His Lordship Calligos Winterscale, our ruler by the will of the Emperor! They are all heretics deserving of a most terrible death. Order will be restored. The guilty will be punished!"

traits.locale_text: «¡La chusma desagradecida se rebeló contra el legítimo gobernador del planeta y milord Calligos Winterscale, nuestro gobernante por voluntad del Emperador! Son todos unos herejes y merecen la muerte más atroz. El orden será restaurado. Los culpables serán castigados».

languages.text: "Nankör ayaktakımı, gezegenin meşru valisine ve İmparator'un arzusuyla hükümdarımız olan Lord Calligos Winterscale Hazretleri'ne isyan etti! Kâfirler, ölümlerden ölüm beğensin. Nizam tekrar sağlanacak. Suçlular cezalandırılacak!"
languages.original_text: "The ungrateful rabble rose in rebellion against the planet's lawful governor and His Lordship Calligos Winterscale, our ruler by the will of the Emperor! They are all heretics deserving of a most terrible death. Order will be restored. The guilty will be punished!"

traits.locale_text: "Nankör ayaktakımı, gezegenin meşru valisine ve İmparator'un arzusuyla hükümdarımız olan Lord Hazretleri Calligos Winterscale'e isyan etti! Kâfirler, ölümlerden ölüm beğensin. Nizam tekrar sağlanacak. Suçlular cezalandırılacak!"
